column4: Hi everyone... does anyone know how to set audacious as default mp3 player?
but it seems it does not work fine
that's hard to do over irc
for example I choosed Custom, then I wrote vlc to set vlc as default and when I do double click... movie player starts... strange
not really... are you sure you have vlc installed?
did you try right clicking on the file?
but in this way if I fix for example audacious for a single mp3 file... all mp3 files will be opened using audacious or I have to set every file?
it will apply to all mp3s
now I want to solve another problem regarding my shutdown
